frontmatter.title: Always Use Node (Even on Non-Node Projects)

nodes.excerpt: That’s right. I said it: Always use Node, no matter what! Even if your server isn’t going to be a Node server, just have it installed…
Get it? RequireJS is a dependency management framework I use in JavaScript to manage…well my dependencies. But, the title is a play on words…

frontmatter.title: Why do you CoffeeScript your JavaScript?

nodes.excerpt: I was asked this the other day: Why don’t you just write your code in JavaScript directly? As in, why would you use a langugage that…
The answer is simple: I don’t want to limit about my platform options on day one. JavaScript is the native language of that whole “Internet…
